backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that stores plant diagnoses, analyzes symptoms to infer issues, and exposes methods to submit and retrieve diagnoses.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file linking features to frontend source files, components, and requirements for build validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining the botanical color system, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app and mounts it to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component coordinating the UI flow between the hero section, plant info form, and diagnosis results.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosisResults: Component that renders the diagnosis details with severity indicators, treatment steps, and care recommendations.
frontend/src/components/PlantInfoForm.ts: Form component collecting plant details and symptoms, validating input, and submitting data to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that submits plant info to the backend actor and returns a diagnosis.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark botanical color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/edenmindCopy.ts: Contains static UI text and helper strings for form labels, results, and messaging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, providing React Query and Internet Identity contexts around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and asset needs for the EdenMind application.
